```{r}

```


```{r}
j3_dataset <- inner_join(j2_dataset, contributions, by= "cmte_id") 
j3_dataset <- j3_dataset %>%
 select(cand_id.x, state.x, incumbent, party, cmte_id, cmte_name, cmte_party_affiliation, cand_party_affiliation, cand_office, state.y, transaction_amt) %>%
  group_by(cand_id.x) %>% 
mutate(total_contributions= sum(transaction_amt))
j3_dataset
```

```{r}
j4_dataset <- j3_dataset %>%

j4_dataset
```



```{r}
j5_dataset <- inner_join(j3_dataset, j4_dataset, by= "cand_id.x")  %>%
  select(cand_id.x, state.x.x, total_contributions.y, total_contributions_state) %>%
  group_by(cand_id.x) %>%
  mutate(percentage_of_contribution=  (total_contributions.y/total_contributions_state)*100)
```
